```{r echo = FALSE, results='hide'}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(lubridate)
library(RSocrata)
library(tsfknn)
library(fpp3)
library(tsibble)
library(feasts)
library(timetk)
```


```{r}
load("meeting_6.RData")
```

```{r}
bx_ts2 %>% glimpse()
```
```{r plotly of bxts_2}
bx_ts %>% plot_time_series((month), total_waste)
```

## bx_ts can't be a tsibble. It must be a tibble or data.frame. From the timetk::tk_tsfeatures documentation

```{r}
timetk::tk_tsfeatures(.data = bx_ts,
  .date_var = month,
  .value = total_waste)
```

```{r}
bx_ts %>% timetk::tk_tsfeatures(
  .date_var = month,
  .value = total_waste,
  .features = c("frequency", "stl_features", "entropy", "acf_features")
  ) %>% 
  glimpse(.) %>% ungroup()
```
